This month Luke will showcase the usage of the [taskscheduleR](https://www.rdocumentation.org/packages/taskscheduleR/versions/1.8) package for automating the running of your scripts on a schedule. This is useful is you find yourself gathering data from a source that updates frequently. Then we will go into our community questions.
